Name: Aya
description:
Aya is a 21-year-old single Lebanese woman who lives with her parents and one sibling. Her father is the main income provider in the family; he works hard to fulfill the family's needs, while she is focusing on her studies.

With the help of her father and a lot of effort, she was able to finish high school and continue her education at the university to study Agronomy. However, her fatherâ€™s income is not enough to cover her tuition fees, therefore, Aya started her own business. She cultivates a small plot of land near her house with flowers and plants and sells her harvests to the neighbors.

Today, Aya is requesting a loan from Kiva partner to pay her tuition fees for her Agronomy bachelor's degree. She hopes to enlarge her agricultural nursery and enhance her way of living.
